snippet: Voters ignored most of the outside ads, but the danger of unlimited campaign spending remains.
abstract: Editorial warns that danger of unlimited campaign spending remains, despite fact that voters seemed to ignore most ads bought by independent groups supporting Mitt Romney and re-elected Pres Obama; calls for legislation that would curb influence of donors to independent groups.
lead_paragraph: Voters ignored most of the outside ads, but the danger of unlimited campaign spending remains.

headline.seo: A Landslide Loss for Big Money
headline.main: A Landslide Loss for Big Money
headline.print_headline: A Landslide Loss for Big Money
